RDF Collections 
•  Groups of things represented as a list structure 
-  “A container with limits” 
•  Constructed using rdf:List, rdf:first, rdf:rest, and 
rdf:nil

university:Course1 
      
university:hasTeacher 
rdf:next 
people:Raul 
rdf:first 
rdf:nil 
rdf:next 
people:Oscar 
rdf:first 
rdf:List 
rdf:type 
© Raúl García Castro et al. 
RDF Reification 
•  RDF statements about other RDF statements 
-  “Raúl believes that Oscar’s birthdate is on Feb 2nd, 1976 and 
that his e-mail address is ocorcho@fi.upm.es” 
•  Expressed using rdf:Statement, rdf:subject, 
rdf:predicate, and rdf:object 
•  RDF Reification 
-  Allows expressing beliefs (and other modalities) 
-  Allows expressing trust models, digital signatures, etc. 
-  Allows expressing metadata about metadata 
16 
people:Raul 
people:Oscar 
modal:believes 
“ocorcho@fi.upm.es” 
properties:hasEmailAddress 
“1976-02-02”^^xsd:date 
properties:hasBirthDate
